page.title: 13INDUSTRY_OLD DOCKS
page.content: modern area with security guards,bright yellow crane,modern ships, to handle the nuclear waste.British gas have a condensate storage area.This is very modern.We were not allowed in.There is one railway line connecting BNFL to the main line to Sellafield where the waste nuclear fuel is processed.The sea scouts have some sheds and boats and use the docks for sailing on. Outside the docks are large areas of mud flats.The main channel is marked with lighthouses,and big red and green buoys.There are lots of small sailing boats and fishing boats in the channel.We saw seven cargo boats tied up.We did not see many people.
